âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Connects frontend UI to code AI agents â€¢ Allows commenting on any DOM element â€¢ Sends DOM elements, screenshots, and metadata to AI agent
ðŸ“– Summary: Stagewise is a browser toolbar that bridges the gap between frontend UIs and code AI agents. It allows developers to select and comment on any DOM element, sending relevant context like DOM elements, screenshots, and metadata to the AI agent. This eliminates the need for manually providing file paths and other contextual information, streamlining the AI-assisted development process.
